quotes.quote: Kids flourish if we get them to school every day.
The only way to thrive is to innovate. It's that simple.
We thrive not when we've done it all, but when we still have more to do.
We all make mistakes, but the people who thrive from their mistakes are the successful ones.
No society can thrive when half its people are left behind.
Resilience is all about being able to overcome the unexpected. Sustainability is about survival. The goal of resilience is to thrive.
When women thrive, all of society benefits, and succeeding generations are given a better start in life.
To fully thrive, we must not only eliminate the stressors but also actively seek joyful, loving, fulfilling lives that stimulate growth processes.
An apple tree is just like a person. In order to thrive, it needs companionship that's similar to it in some ways, but quite different than others.
Criminals thrive on the indulgence of society's understanding.
Children with an entrepreneurial mindset are the people who will make our economy thrive.
My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
For integrity to flourish in society, we have to nurture it within ourselves, in our children, in our education systems.
A nation, like a tree, does not thrive well till it is engraffed with a foreign stock.
When women thrive, economies thrive.
It takes but one positive thought when given a chance to survive and thrive to overpower an entire army of negative thoughts.
Thriving. That's fighting. Surviving is barely getting by.
God created us to thrive on encouragement from others.
The way to thrive is to help others thrive; the way to flourish is to help others flourish; the way to fulfill yourself is to spend yourself.
If a good man thrive, all thrive with him.
Everyone thrives most in his or her own unique environment
Only in the last moment in history has the delusion arisen that people can flourish apart from the rest of the living world.
We can only flourish when we are truly grounded in self. keep that in mind when journeying.
There's very few people, who really thrive creatively under great stress and conflict.
Potential is an excuse to procrastinate;Ambition is a means to thrive.
Some people thrive under pressure, but pressure can also ruin your performance, it can push you down angles which you don't want to go.
Bad ideas flourish because they are in the interest of powerful groups.
People thrive by focusing on the question of who they really are and connecting that to work that they truly love.
We laugh to survive. Then, with joy we thrive.
We can thrive and bloom if we are rooted in our love of the Savior.
